arts.sum: Following the 2-2 draw against Bologna in Serie A, Inter Milan's head coach Simone Inzaghi expressed his dissatisfaction with the outcome, despite acknowledging the efforts of his players. arts.ttl: Serie A | Inter 2-2 Bologna: Match Report
arts.sum: In a thrilling Serie A encounter at the San Siro, Inter Milan were held to a 2-2 draw by a determined Bologna side on Wednesday night. The match was a rollercoaster of emotions for both sets of fans, with goals from Santiago Castro, Denzel Dumfries, Lautaro Martinez, and Emil Holm providing an entertaining spectacle. arts.ttl: Inter’s Transfer Tangle with Bologna: Asllani at the Center
arts.sum: The upcoming Serie A match between Inter and Bologna, a rescheduled fixture from the 19th round, is shaping up to be a crucial encounter for Inter. With Hakan Calhanoglu sidelined due to yet another physical issue, Kristjan Asllani is set to step into the pivotal regista role in front of the defence in Simone Inzaghi's tactical setup.
